name: THIS WILL DESTROY YOU
description:
"THIS WILL DESTROY YOU" (R-18!)

is an Albert/Jill story told in an alternate timeline where Chris Redfield and Sheva Alomar were successful in capturing Wesker alive before he could take off in the jet. 

The events take place ten years after Africa and there are several details hidden throughout the story that will have tie ins later.

This is very OOC as I am not the best writer, and Wesker is HEAVILY medicated with an unknown medicine to keep him in check. 

Chris is on active duty, and is contacted while out in the field. 

(If it's confusing why he's in the shot, it's because he's on a video call or it's a memory.) 

This is a VERY NSFW story. There are elements of drug use, non-con references, abuse, torture and emotional and physical manipulation. 

(this is 18+! R-18!)

PLEASE KEEP IN MIND THAT THIS IS A WIP CURRENTLY AND IS NOT REFINED, FINISHED NOR PERFECT. Cut me some slack, I'm still working on it!

#Weskertine #WeskerxJill

Thank you to 

@Kazukii for the background music.

@Freesound for the ambient and misc noises 

@Sergey Makhno Architects for their beautiful concept art for an underground bunker that I have used in this story. 

And as usual! 

RESIDENT EVIL AND THE CHARACTERS IN THIS STORY BELONG TO @CAPCOM!

Thanks for playing, and enjoy!
